 18 /**
 19  * Baseclass for all widgets. 
 20  * 
 21  * <p> Handles selection and request of items (called by the manager) and provides 
 22  *     abstract hooks for child classes to display the data.  </p>
 23  *
 24  * @param properties A map of fields to set. Refer to the list of non-private fields.  
 25  * @class AbstractWidget
 26  */
 27 jQuery.solrjs.AbstractWidget = jQuery.solrjs.createClass (null, /** @lends jQuery.solrjs.AbstractWidget.prototype */ { 
 28 
 29   /** 
 30    * A unique identifier of this widget.
 31    *
 32    * @field 
 33    * @public
 34    */
 35   id : "", 
 36 
 37   /** 
 38    * The number of documents this widgets requests.
 39    * Normally only useful for result widgets.
 40    *
 41    * @field 
 42    * @default 0
 43    * @public
 44    */
 45 	rows : 0, 
 46 	
 47 	/** 
 48    * A private flag that displays the selection status of a widget.
 49    * Selected widgets normally don't need to update their data when 
 50    * the selection changes.
 51    * 
 52    * @field 
 53    * @private
 54    */
 55 	selected : false,
 56 	
 57 	/** 
 58    * A css classname representing the "target div" inside the html page.
 59    * All ui changes will be performed inside this empty div.
 60    * 
 61    * @field 
 62    * @private
 63    */
 64   target : "",
 65   
 66   /** 
 67    * A flag for result widgets. These widgets also get updated on page changes,
 68    * 
 69    * @field 
 70    * @private
 71    */
 72   isResult : false,
 73   
 74   /** 
 75    * A flag that indicates whether the loading icon should be displayed.
 76    * 
 77    * @field 
 78    * @private
 79    */
 80   showLoadingDiv : false,
 81   
 82   /** 
 83    * A flag that indicates whether the widget should save the current selection. If set to false,
 84    * a widget may be selected more than once.
 85    * 
 86    * @field 
 87    * @private
 88    */
 89   saveSelection : false,
 90 
 91   /**
 92    * Generates the solr request url for this widget and delegates the actual request
 93    * to the implementation. This method is only called by the manager.
 94    * 
 95    * @param query The current solr query
 96    * @start The offset.
 97    * @param resultsOnly Indicates that only the page changed and only result widgets should repaint).
 98    */
 99   doRequest : function(query, start, resultsOnly) { 
100   	if (resultsOnly && !this.isResult) {
101       return;
102     }   
103   	if (this.saveSelection && this.selected) {
104 			return;
105 		}    
106 		var solrRequestUrl = "";
107 		solrRequestUrl += this.manager.solrUrl;
108 		solrRequestUrl += "?";		
109 		solrRequestUrl += "&rows=" + this.rows;		
110     solrRequestUrl += "&start=" + start;				
111 		solrRequestUrl += "&q=" + query;		
112 		solrRequestUrl += this.getSolrUrl(start);	
113 
114 		// show loading gif
115 		if (this.showLoadingDiv) {
116 		  jQuery(this.target).html(this.manager.getLoadingDiv());
117 		}
118 		
119 		// let the implementation execute the call
120 		this.executeHttpRequest(solrRequestUrl);
121 		
122 	},
123 
124   /**
125    * Marks this widget as selected and store selected items.
126    * This method is only called by the manager.
127    *
128    * @param items The list of newly selected items.
129    */
130   select: function(items) {
131   	if (this.saveSelection) {
132     	this.selected = true;
133   		this.selectedItems = items;
134   	}
135 	  this.handleSelect();  	
136   },
137     
138   /**
139    * Marks this widget as unselected and clears the selected items.
140    * This method is only called by the manager.
141    */  
142   deselect: function() {
143     if (this.saveSelection) {
144       this.selected = false;
145     }  
146     this.handleDeselect();
147   },
148 
149 
150 	// Methods to be overridden by widgets:
151 
152   /**
153    * An abstract hook for child implementations. This method should
154    * execute the http request.
155    * @param the complete solr request url.
156    * @abstract 
157    */
158   executeHttpRequest : function(url) { 
159 		throw "Abstract method executeHttpRequest"; 
160 	},
161 
162   /** 
163    * An abstract hook for child implementations. It should add widget specific
164    * request parameters like facet=true..
165    * @param start The offset.
166    */
167   getSolrUrl : function(start) { 
168 		// to be overridden
169 		return ""; 
170 	},
171 
172   /** 
173    * An abstract hook for child implementations. Called after a widget is selected.
174    * Child implementations should take care of changing the ui. 
175    */
176   handleSelect : function() { 
177 		// do nothing. Implementations may place some handler code here. 
178 	},
179 
180   /** 
181    * An abstract hook for child implementations. Called after a widget is deselected.
182    * Child implementations should take care of changing the ui. 
183    */
184 	handleDeselect : function() { 
185 		// do nothing Implementations may place some handler code here. 
186 	},
187 	
188 	afterAdditionToManager : function() { 
189     // do nothing by default. Implementations may place some init code here. 
190   }
191 });
192
